query:
select mailing_id, name, count(*) as nb, DATE_FORMAT(avg(time_stamp), '%Y-%m-%S %h:%i:%s') avg_sent, min(start_date) start, max(end_date) end, subject 
from civicrm_mailing_event_delivered d 
join civicrm_mailing_event_queue q on d.event_queue_id=q.id 
join civicrm_mailing_job j on j.id=q.job_id 
join civicrm_mailing m on m.id=mailing_id 
where mailing_id in 
  (select mailing_id_a as id 
     from civicrm_mailing_abtest where id=%1 union 
   select mailing_id_b as id 
     from civicrm_mailing_abtest where id=%1
  ) 
group by mailing_id;
